info.name: Testing Week 2
info.description: This collection verifies the 60-80% functional prototype for the Fantastic Four AI Mock Interview Platform. It demonstrates the complete end to end data flow between the FastAPI backend, Gemini 2.5 Flash, Firebase Firestore.

request.description: Sends a Base 64 audio URI to the Gemini multimodal API. Returns a structured JSON response containing the transcript and the analaysis metrics.
Initializes a session in Firebase Firestore, creates a document with a unique session ID, and returns a contextual question generated by Gemini.
Submits the full transcript to the evaluation engine. Returns a strictly enforced JSON evaluation report and saves the final report to Firebase.
